# 影音轉逐字稿 / 如何在 Macbook 裝 whisper / How to Install whisper in Macbook

- > Open the terminal (Input "terminal" in spotlight or find "Terminal" in Launchpad)
- 輸入 git ，會跳出要安裝 XCode，讓他慢慢安裝
- Enter "git", choose "yes" if 
- 安裝 homebrew

    - 貼上以下這串
